Verses: 1 niniveyin Baaram. Elkosaanaagiya Naagoomin Dharisanap Pusthagam.

2 karththar Erichchalullavarum Needhiyai Sarikkattugiravarumaana Dhevan; Karththar Needhiyai Sarikkattugiravar, Ukkirakobamullavar; Karththar Thammudaiya Saththurukkalukkup Pradhibalan Alikkiravar, Avar Thammudaiya Pagaignarukkaagak Kobaththai Vaiththuvaikkiravar.

3 karththar Neediya Saandhamum, Migundha Vallamaiyumullavar; Avargalai Aakkinaiyillaamal Thappuvikkamaattaar; Karththarudaiya Vazhi Suzhalkaatrilum Perungaatrilum Irukkiradhu; Megangal Avarudaiya Paadhaththukkullaayirukkiradhu.
4 avar Samuththiraththai Adhatti, Adhai Vatrippogappanni, Sagala Aarugalaiyum Varatchiyaakkugiraar. Paasaanum Karmelum Sorndhu, Leebanonin Sezhippu Vaadippogum.
5 avar Samugaththil Parvadhangal Adhirndhu Malaigal Karaindhupogum; Avar Prasannaththinaal Boomiyum Sakkaramum Adhil Kudiyirukkira Anaivarodum Edupattuppom.
6 avarudaiya Kobaththukku Munbaaga Nirpavan Yaar? Avarudaiya Ukkirakobaththile Tharippavan Yaar? Avarudaiya Erichchal Akkiniyaippola Iraikkappadugiradhu; Avaraale Kanmalaigal Perkkappadum.
7 karththar Nallavar, Ikkattu Naalile Aranaana Kottai; Thammai Nambugiravargalai Arindhirukkiraar.
8 aanaalum Niniveyin Sthaanaththai, Puranduvarugira Vellaththinaal Sarvasangaarampannuvaar; Irul Avar Saththurukkalaip Pinthodarum.
9 neengal Karththarukku Virodhamaaga Seyya Ninaikkiradhenna? Avar Sarvasangaarampannuvaar; Idukkam Marupadiyum Undaagaadhu.
10 avargal Sannapinnalaayirukkira Mutchedigalukku Oppaayirukkaiyilum, Thangal Madhubaanaththinaal Verikondirukkaiyilum, Avargal Muzhudhum Kaaindhupona Seththaiyaippola Erindhupovaargal.
11 karththarukku Virodhamaagap Pollaadha Ninaivukondirukkira Dhuraalosanaikkaaran Oruvan Unnidaththilirundhu Purappattaan.

12 karththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Avargal Sampooranamadaindhu Anegaraayirundhaalum Aruppundupovaargal; Avan Ozhindhupovaan; Unnai Naan Sirumaippaduththinen, Ini Unnai Sirumaippaduththaadhiruppen.
13 ippodhum Naan Unmel Irukkira Avan Nugaththai Muriththu Un Kattugalai Aruppen.

14 unnaikkuriththuk Karththar Kattalaikoduththirukkiraar; Ini Un Perukku Viththuvidhaikkappaduvadhillai; Un Dhevargalin Kovilil Irukkira Vettappatta Vikkiragaththaiyum Vaarkkappatta Vikkiragaththaiyum Naan Nirmoolampannuven; Nee Ganaveenanaanapadiyaal Adhai Unakkup Predhakkuzhiyaakkuven.

15 idho, Samaadhaanaththaik Koorugira Suviseshaganudaiya Kaalgal Malaigalinmel Varugiradhu; Yoodhaave, Unpandigaigalai Aasari; Un Poruththanaigalai Seluththu; Dhushtan Ini Un Vazhiyaaik Kadandhuvaruvadhillai, Avan Muzhudhum Sangarikkappattaan.
